<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2231</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A Collection of simulations and learning objects for Chemistry and Physics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Ansammlung Simulationen und 
Lernennachrichten für Chemie und Physik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection d'objets de simulations et 
d'étude pour la chimie et la physique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção de objetos das simulações e da 
aprendizagem para o chemistry e a física</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione di oggetti imparare e di 
simulazioni per chimica e fisica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συλλογή των προσομοιώσεων και των αντικειμένων 
εκμάθησης για τη χημεία και τη φυσική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una colección de los objetos de las simulaciones
y el aprender para la química y la física</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A Collection of simulations, tutorials , virtual laboratories and other learning objects for the teaching of Chemistry and physics</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Chemistry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science Education</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Ansammlung Simulationen, Tutorials, 
virtuelle Labors und anderes Lernen wendet für den Unterricht von 
Chemie und von Physik ein</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection de simulations, de cours 
d'instruction, de laboratoires virtuels et de toute autre étude 
objecte pour l'enseignement de la chimie et de la physique</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção das simulações, dos tutorials, de
laboratórios virtuais e da outra aprendizagem objeta para o ensino do
chemistry e da física</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione di simulazioni, di lezioni 
private, di laboratori virtuali e de altro imparare obietta per 
l'insegnamento della chimica e della fisica</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συλλογή των προσομοιώσεων, των σεμιναρίων, των 
εικονικών εργαστηρίων και άλλης εκμάθησης αντιτίθεται για τη 
διδασκαλία της χημείας και της φυσικής</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una colección de las simulaciones, de las 
guías, de los laboratorios virtuales y de otro aprender se opone para
la enseñanza de la química y de la física</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chimie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation de la Science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chemistry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chimica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione Di Scienza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

        </general>
